Articles.Content:
what if Kerbals are real and they have contact with the dev's of the game. and they send all our crafts to them so they use them for their space program:confused:

lol nope
if that was true then Squad Space Program would be very expensive and... explodey. Most of the time.

2.2 Forbidden content

f. Conspiracy theories;

From the forum rules. This is why they have added it there. You are onto something big!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/30064-Community-Rules-October-27th-2013

Hello there

I can assure you that there has been no involvement of any extraterrestrial life in the development of the game. What you may or may not assume to indicate otherwise is merely the result of a gas leak. Please move along and let our engineers handle this matter for your safety.

FEichinger
